column4: OK, my ubuntu system after 6 months of usage is very slow with compiz (it wasn't even a bit the first 2-3 months - i created a new user - its with the comfortable speed) so, whats the problem? Do I have too many progs. installed or what? I want the speed back!!
i've noticed that, too...reminds me of windows
so I think I should create a new user or something and continue from it
